name: Enlighten (Tumblecoin)
description:
JUM, JUM ... I like numbers and mathematics ...

Come and have fun learning and discover how fun numbers can be.  

On this trip you are Logan, a young man looking for his way home. Will you help Logan recover his family?   Be careful! The road is full of difficulties, where only those who are willing to overcome their darkest fears ... that's right ... mathematics ...
